EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Per my voice mail, I wanted to give you an overview of the ExxonMobil Fleet card program. I know you will find it the perfect tool to help you save money and time when it comes to managing your business vehicles.
Savings
Save 50 cents/gallon for 4 weeks,* then up to 6 cents per gallon** every time you fuel at any Exxon or Mobil-branded stations No set up, monthly or annual fees Plus you can use the free loyalty program Plenti to help you reward and retain your drivers
Convenience & Control
Accepted at nearly 11,000 Exxon- and Mobil-branded stations nationwide Easy online controls so you can set spending limits and monitor driver behavior Smart phone app to make managing your program while on the go even easier
I will be following up with you next week. In the meantime, you can reach me at {!User.Phone} or via email at {!User.Email}.
I look forward to helping you save time and money for your business.
Sincerely,
